name: Lemon Garlic Salmon
instruction: Preheat oven to 375°F. Place salmon on a baking sheet, drizzle with olive oil, and sprinkle with minced garlic, lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Bake for 15-20 minutes until the salmon is cooked through.

name: Chicken Francese
instruction: Season chicken with salt and pepper, dredge in flour, dip in beaten eggs. Cook in a pan with olive oil until golden. Remove chicken, add broth, lemon juice, and butter to the pan. Simmer and return chicken to the pan, cooking until the sauce thickens.

name: Beef and Broccoli Stir Fry
instruction: Marinate beef in soy sauce, garlic, and ginger for 15 minutes. Cook beef in a pan with oil until browned. Remove beef, add broccoli and stir fry until tender. Return beef to pan, add cornstarch mixed with water, and cook until sauce thickens.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
instruction: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions. In a bowl, beat eggs and mix with grated parmesan. Cook pancetta in a pan until crispy, add minced garlic. Combine spaghetti with pancetta, remove from heat and mix in egg mixture quickly. Season with black pepper and serve.

name: Chicken Tacos
instruction: Season chicken with taco seasoning, cook in a pan until done. Shred the chicken, warm tortillas in a pan. Assemble tacos by adding chicken, lettuce, cheese, sour cream, and salsa to tortillas.

name: Shrimp Scampi
instruction: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions. In a pan, melt butter with olive oil, add minced garlic and cook until fragrant. Add shrimp, cook until pink. Add white wine and lemon juice, simmer. Toss cooked spaghetti with shrimp mixture, garnish with parsley.

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
instruction: Chop vegetables into bite-sized pieces. Heat oil in a pan, add garlic and ginger, cook until fragrant. Add vegetables, stir fry until tender. Mix soy sauce with cornstarch and water, add to pan. Cook until sauce thickens.

name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
instruction: Preheat oven to 375°F. Cut tops off bell peppers, remove seeds. Cook ground beef with chopped onion and garlic until browned. Mix in cooked rice and tomato sauce. Stuff peppers with beef mixture, place in a baking dish, top with cheese. Bake for 25-30 minutes.

name: Chicken Alfredo
instruction: Cook fettuccine according to package instructions. In a pan, melt butter, add minced garlic and cook until fragrant. Add cream and bring to a simmer. Stir in grated parmesan until melted. Season chicken with salt and pepper, cook in a separate pan until done. Slice chicken, add to sauce, toss with fettuccine.

name: Beef Tacos
instruction: Cook ground beef with taco seasoning until browned. Warm tortillas in a pan. Assemble tacos by adding beef, lettuce, cheese, sour cream, and salsa to tortillas.

name: Eggplant Parmesan
instruction: Slice eggplant and dredge in flour, beaten eggs, and breadcrumbs. Bake until golden, then layer with marinara sauce and cheeses. Bake until bubbly and golden.

name: Chicken Fajitas
instruction: Slice chicken, peppers, and onion. Sauté in olive oil with fajita seasoning until cooked. Serve with tortillas.

name: Beef Stroganoff
instruction: Cook beef and set aside. Sauté onions and mushrooms, add flour, then broth. Stir in sour cream and beef. Serve over noodles.

name: Shrimp Scampi
instruction: Cook shrimp in butter with garlic, add lemon juice and wine. Toss with cooked pasta and parsley.

name: Turkey Scallopini
instruction: Dredge turkey in flour, cook in butter. Add broth, lemon juice, and capers. Simmer until sauce thickens.

name: Weeknight Ravioli Lasagna
instruction: Layer cooked beef with ravioli, marinara, and cheeses in a baking dish. Bake until bubbly.

name: Chicken with Couscous
instruction: Cook chicken and slice. Prepare couscous according to package. Toss with tomatoes, cucumber, feta, and olive oil. Serve with chicken.

name: One-Pot Garlicky Shrimp & Broccoli
instruction: Cook shrimp and broccoli with garlic and olive oil. Add lemon juice and serve over rice.
